parameters.name: ClusterStorage
parameters.description: The storage capacity of the instance after the upgrade. Unit: GB. Valid values: **480** to **1017600**.

parameters.name: ColdStorage
parameters.description: The cold storage capacity of the instance after the upgrade. Unit: GB. Valid values: **800** to **1000000**.

parameters.name: CoreSingleStorage
parameters.description: The storage capacity of a single core node in the multi-zone instance after the upgrade. Valid values: 400 to 64000. Unit: GB. **This parameter is available only for multi-zone instances.**

parameters.name: FilestoreNum
parameters.description: The number of file engine nodes in the instance after the upgrade. Valid values: **0** to **60**.

parameters.name: FilestoreSpec
parameters.description:
The specifications of the file engine nodes of the instance after the upgrade. Valid value:

**lindorm.c.xlarge**: 4 cores, 8 GB (Standard)

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. Call the [GetLindormInstanceList](~~426069~~) operation to obtain the instance ID.

parameters.name: LindormNum
parameters.description:
The number of LindormTable nodes in the instance after the upgrade. Valid values: **0** to **90**.

> This parameter must be specified with the LindormSpec parameter.

parameters.name: LindormSpec
parameters.description:
The specifications of the LindormTable nodes of the instance after the upgrade. Valid values:

- **lindorm.c.xlarge**: 4 cores, 8 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.c.2xlarge**: 8 cores, 16 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.c.4xlarge**: 16 cores, 32 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.c.8xlarge**: 32 cores, 64 GB (Dedicated)

parameters.name: LogNum
parameters.description: The number of log nodes in the multi-zone instance after the upgrade. Valid values: 4 to 400. **This parameter is available only for multi-zone instances.**

parameters.name: LogSingleStorage
parameters.description: The disk capacity of a single log node in the multi-zone instance after the upgrade. Valid values: 400 to 64000. Unit: GB. **This parameter is available only for multi-zone instances.**

parameters.name: LogSpec
parameters.description:
The specifications of the log nodes in the multi-zone instance after the upgrade. Valid values:

- **lindorm.sn1.large**: 4 cores, 8 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.sn1.2xlarge**: 8 cores, 16 GB (Dedicated)

**This parameter is available only for multi-zone instances.**

parameters.name: LtsCoreNum
parameters.description: The number of LTS nodes in the instance after the upgrade. Valid values: **0** to **50**.

parameters.name: LtsCoreSpec
parameters.description:
The specifications of the Lindorm Tunnel Service (LTS) nodes of the instance after the upgrade. Valid values:

- **lindorm.g.xlarge**: 4 cores, 16 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.g.2xlarge**: 8 cores, 32 GB (Dedicated)

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the instance is located. Call the [DescribeRegions](~~426062~~) operation to obtain the region ID.

parameters.name: SolrNum
parameters.description: The number of search engine nodes in the instance after the upgrade. Valid values: **0** to **60**.

parameters.name: SolrSpec
parameters.description:
The specifications of the search engine nodes of the instance after the upgrade. Valid values:

- **lindorm.g.xlarge**: 4 cores, 16 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.g.2xlarge**: 8 cores, 32 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.g.4xlarge**: 16 cores, 64 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.g.8xlarg**e: 32 cores, 128 GB (Dedicated)

parameters.name: StreamNum
parameters.description: The number of stream engine nodes in the instance after the upgrade. Valid values: **0** to **90**.

parameters.name: StreamSpec
parameters.description:
The specifications of the stream engine nodes of the instance after the upgrade. Valid values:

- **lindorm.c.2xlarge**: 8 cores, 16 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.c.4xlarge**: 16 cores, 32 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.c.8xlarge**: 32 cores, 64 GB (Dedicated)

parameters.name: TsdbNum
parameters.description: The number of LindormTSDB nodes in the instance after the upgrade. Valid values: **0** to **24**.

parameters.name: TsdbSpec
parameters.description:
The specifications of the LindormTSDB nodes of the instance after the upgrade. Valid values:

- **lindorm.g.xlarge**: 4 cores, 16 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.g.2xlarge**: 8 cores, 32 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.g.4xlarge**: 16 cores, 64 GB (Dedicated)

- **lindorm.g.8xlarge**: 32 cores, 128 GB (Dedicated)

parameters.name: UpgradeType
parameters.description: The type of the upgrade. For more information about the supported upgrade types, see the description of the UpgradeType parameter.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The ID of the zone. Call the [GetLindormInstance](~~426067~~) operation to obtain the zone ID.
